EmailTemplate.description: Used automatically when a shipping update is needed
EmailTemplate.name: Order Fulfillment Update Shipping Information Asst
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Fulfillment__c.Product_Name__c}: Shipping Info Needed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Fulfillment__c.Ad_Prod_Alternate_Contact__c},
The shipping information we have on file for {!Fulfillment__c.PrimaryRecipient__c}'s {!Fulfillment__c.Product_Name__c} is incorrect, please connect with your Customer Service Representative so that they can collect updated information:
{!Fulfillment__c.Owner_Info__c}
Thank You!
